pkgmetadata.longdescription:
cl-nebula-www
This is the HTTP frontend for Nebula. It requires nebula[1], and the nebula setup must be complete (namely, database setup and creating the credentials file). For more information about Nebula, see [2].
[1] https://github.com/kisom/nebula [2] https://kyleisom.net/blog/2015/04/07/nebula/
